entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
